>
[Quick Change](/Feats.aspx?ID=6430) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267), [Venture-Gossip](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=311) (Level 7)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6424); Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

You can shift between your identities with ease. Instead of spending 1 minute to change your identity, you can now do so as a 3-action activity. If you are legendary in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38), you can perform this change as a single action.
